prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that glows in the dark and has intricate wing patterns.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a firefly, with bright colors and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a small insect-like Pokemon that can emit light and loves to dance in the air.
Make a whimsical bug-type Pokemon with a round body and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of a beetle and a lantern, glowing brightly at night.
Design a tiny Pokemon with a unique shape that can fly and has a vibrant color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful spirit and is often found in grassy fields.
